title: Introducing: DIICE
body:
With support from Radio 1 already locked in, and a host of top blogs behind them, UK duo **DIICE** are off to a great start with their debut track, _Multigold_.

Coming in somewhere between Oh Wonder and Marian Hill, it’s slickly produced pop at it’s absolute best. Check it out below.

_a multigold we thought we’d never know_

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
